body.raw:
## Tools used in `packages/cli` app:
- [.prettierignore](https://github.com/shadcn-ui/ui/blob/main/packages/cli/.prettierignore)
- [CHANGELOG.md](https://github.com/shadcn-ui/ui/blob/main/packages/cli/CHANGELOG.md) 
- [package.json](https://github.com/shadcn-ui/ui/blob/main/packages/cli/package.json)
- [tsconfig.json](https://github.com/shadcn-ui/ui/blob/main/packages/cli/tsconfig.json)
- [tsup.config.ts](https://github.com/shadcn-ui/ui/blob/main/packages/cli/tsup.config.ts)

## Tools used in `packages/shadcn` app:
- [.prettierignore](https://github.com/shadcn-ui/ui/blob/main/packages/shadcn/.prettierignore)
- [CHANGELOG.md](https://github.com/shadcn-ui/ui/blob/main/packages/shadcn/CHANGELOG.md)
- [package.json](https://github.com/shadcn-ui/ui/blob/main/packages/shadcn/package.json)
- [tsconfig.json](https://github.com/shadcn-ui/ui/blob/main/packages/shadcn/tsconfig.json)
- [tsup.config.ts](https://github.com/shadcn-ui/ui/blob/main/packages/shadcn/tsup.config.ts)
